name: Rewritten
storyline:
With only one weekend to get your aunt's bookstore ready for its grand re-opening, help arrives in an unexpected way when boys start magically hopping out of the books! Will you be able to keep peace between their eccentric personalities, fix up the shop and find love before Monday...?

A cozy, humorous fantasy romance that'll have you fall in love with reading all over again. If you can't pick a boy, pick them all! or give this quiz a spin.
